name: Tap Bounce (Jérémy Hoarau)
description:
Tap Bounce is a hyper-casual mobile game. You are a small guy trying to climb as high as possible while dodging wild creatures.

Simply tap to jump, you can jump once every time you touch a wall or a platform. You can also collect bonuses to help you during you ascension.

Credits:

-Art by Goldmetal Studio and Blackspire.

-Music by Patrick de Arteaga : Chiptronical
